job.title: Data Scientist
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: The Data Scientist is responsible for overseeing the collection storage and interpretation of data for the enterprise scale bigdata analytics platform The focus of this position is to use data to surface relevant insights which deliver value toward achieving national security goalsbrbrThe Data Scientist will work with a small team of professionals with network security and database management and data visualization skills and experience to enable our customers to analyze large amounts of different kinds of data and surface patterns and insights that are relevant to accomplishing national security goals The ideal candidate should have national security analysis experience and use systems engineering and analytical approaches for applying mathematical and statistical principles Critical thinking and problemsolving skills are essential A passion for advanced technology research continual learning is desiredbrbrOur goal is to enable our customer to use their enterprise scale big data analytics platform to systematically apply an analytically rigorous foundation for making better decisionsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliUnderstand and decompose complex national security problems define and implement solutions using advanced quantitative methods that delver meaningful insightsliliParticipate in team and customer meetings effectively communicating complex data and analytic concepts methods and findings in simple actionable waysliliIdentify valuable internal or external data sources which enable surfacing additional relevant analytic insights liliUse knowledge of coding and other computer programming techniques to build tools and data models to automate data collection and storage within the big data analytics platformliliSupport the creation of data structures appropriate for analysisliliPerform preprocessing transformation of structured and unstructured data into formats appropriate for analysisliliTrack analytic recommendations through decision execution and effect to weigh the validity of the data analytic semantic and decision modelsliliBuild predictive models and machinelearning algorithmsliliImproved and combine models through ensemble modelingliliSupport the creation of analytic visualizations to illustrate utility and relevance of actionable results brbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliUnited States Citizenship is requiredliliActive TSSCI Security ClearanceliliHas at least 35 years of data science experience including experience taking enterprise scale ideas from theory to deployment Experience in data analysis can serve as a substitute in some cases liliThe ideal candidate will have a graduate degree An undergraduate degree in a quantitative field mathematics computer science physics economics engineering statistics operations research quantitative social science and a graduate degree in a related field This candidate will also value intellectual curiosity continuing education and make an effort to obtain certifications in coding and data management to perform their job duties wellbrliulThe ideal candidate will possess skills in key areas such asbrulliExperience identifying analytic visualizations which are most effective for a given requirementliliDemonstrated performance in analytical problemsolving liliExperience with data management toolsliliExperience with programming for data analysis ideally Python SQL or RliliExperience with No SQL and or relational databasesliliFamiliarity with Java or C liliExperience using business intelligence tools liliExperience with high performance data frameworks ie Elastic SearchliliExperience with industrystandard tools such for modelingliliExperience with machine learning and AIliliKnowledge of cloud technologies
